rows.label: bf10180100_0003
rows.name:
What is this place?
What happened to everyone?

rows.label: bf10180100_0007
rows.name:
Homura, Hikari, Gramps...
Where are you? Where did you all go?

rows.label: bf10180100_0010
rows.name: Why run?

rows.label: bf10180100_0020
rows.name: Tora...

rows.label: bf10180100_0030
rows.name:
Hana... Zeke and Saika...
No way, you're all...

rows.label: bf10180100_0040
rows.name: Are you having fun, boy?

rows.label: bf10180100_0050
rows.name:
Pretending to be a hero when you're just a kid,
manipulating adults for your own ends.

rows.label: bf10180100_0060
rows.name: T-that's not...

rows.label: bf10180100_0070
rows.name: Boss not fair!

rows.label: bf10180100_0080
rows.name:
Why Boss get to be Driver,
but Tora can't?

rows.label: bf10180100_0090
rows.name: Tora work so hard but it all unfair!

rows.label: bf10180100_0100
rows.name: That's right.

rows.label: bf10180100_0110
rows.name:
Just because little bit lucky,
you get to be Driver of Holy Grail?

rows.label: bf10180100_0120
rows.name: Hana too... not want to be fake like this...

rows.label: bf10180100_0130
rows.name: Hana wanted to be real too!

rows.label: bf10180100_0140
rows.name: It's unfair.

rows.label: bf10180100_0150
rows.name: Must feel real nice, huh?

rows.label: bf10180100_0160
rows.name:
Getting special treatment from everyone,
getting the Holy Grail handed on a silver platter.

rows.label: bf10180100_0170
rows.name: That power is wasted on someone like you.

rows.label: bf10180100_0180
rows.name:
I'm telling you for your own good.
Give it to the Prince right now.

rows.label: bf10180100_0190
rows.name: He deserves it.

rows.label: bf10180100_0200
rows.name:
Cut it out!
What have I done to deserve this?

rows.label: bf10180100_0210
rows.name: Can't you even figure that out?

rows.label: bf10180100_0220
rows.name:
Have you seen what's scattered along
the path you've taken?

rows.label: bf10180100_0230
rows.name: Didn't you ever bother to look back?
